om.administration.questionbank
Class ClearanceResponseRenderer

java.lang.Object
  om.administration.questionbank.ClearanceResponseRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ClearanceResponseRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Responsible for rendering the output from the ClearanceResponses. This implementation uses a configured xhtml to then place details of the response into.

Author:
Trevor Hinson
See Also:
